# Security Policy

## Reporting a Vulnerability
If you discover a security vulnerability in this repository, please report it responsibly by contacting the repository owner:

- Email: contact.l-51@proton.me
- Subject: Security Vulnerability Report

Do not open an issue publicly for security vulnerabilities.

## Response Timeline
We aim to respond to security reports as soon as posible. Please do not publicly disclose the vulnerability until a fix has been released.

## Good Practices
- Do not include sensitive information in public issues.
- Provide clear steps to reproduce the issue.
- Include environment and version information if relevant.

## Security Updates
All security fixes will be included in future releases. Users are advised to keep their installations up-to-date.
